channel.title: Elasticsearch on Kaumil Trivedi
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on Kaumil Trivedi

item.title: Blogging website
item.description: Established a mechanism for a user to follow different people and have the posts of the followed people on the home page. Established an “Explore” feature where a user can explore different posts from all the users on the website in a descending order of the post timestamp. Established a “Search” feature using Elasticsearch where people can search for a keyword and have relevant posts displayed. Github link: https://github.com/kaumil/flask-blog
